page.title: 02Housing,Great Ayton.
page.content: In the domesday block there is the village of Great Ayton in which there are three estates_{Linden,Rosehill}and {Roseberry.}The most popular styles are detached and semi-detached. Most of the houses are private. Many of the houses were built in the 1970's. A lot of the houses are built of brick and a few are built of stone. The common size is eight to eleven rooms. Most private houses have a garage. The average cost of a detached house is {Â£45,000.}There was a great leap in the housing industry from 1860 because {Roseberry Topping}was found to have loads of{iron ore}in it. Part of Great Ayton was then named{California because people came to the area for jobs, the same as with the California gold rush. In Great Ayton we have one mansion called Cleveland Lodge. It is now owned by the {Fry family.
